title: Astana Sends Sprinter Ace Syritsa to B-Team as Chinese-Backed XDS Era Begins
content:
XDS Astana is reshuffling its deck for 2025 as it chases WorldTour salvation and the expected arrival of a Chinese racer.

Read the full article at Astana Sends Sprinter Ace Syritsa to B-Team as Chinese-Backed XDS Era Begins on Velo.
author: ahood
